sentence: But if you disagree with me, my doors always open.? Governors like Brian Kemp of Georgia and Ron DeSantis of Florida have said relatively little on the issue since the draft opinion came out.

sentence: "Good for Brian Kemp who stayed the course and showed what you can do when you have a real record to run on and you don't have to kowtow to this and you don't have to change yourselfbe who you are and that authenticity has carried him."
